name: E-Dynamics Virtual Worlds
tag_list: virtual-worlds, social-games, social-media, mmog, media, entertainment, virtual-currency, virtual-pets, interactive-media, next-generation
overview: -Dynamics is an advanced interactive social media development company and a pioneer in 3D Virtual Worlds and Social Games. As online media and social experiences become dramatically more immersive, interactive, intelligent and emotionally-responsive, E-Dynamics is at the forefront of these innovations. These technologies and solutions provides corporations and brands the power and ability to create rich, compelling on 3D environments and experiences that are far more engaging, entertaining, interactive and valuable than other traditional online advertising and social media campaigns. The company’s vision is to radically transform new digital media and virtual social environments in Interactive Social Media, Casual Gaming and the 3D Web.
